alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Carroll; Henderson; Henry; Jo Daviess; Mercer; Putnam; Rock Island; Stephenson; Warren; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 3:00PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Mixed precipitation also possible at times especially south of Interstate 80. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and a glaze of ice accumulation possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph later Friday and Friday night, producing significant drifting and blowing snow. Also, rapidly falling temperatures may produce a flash freeze by Friday evening and add to the slick conditions. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois and east central, northeast and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and dangerous. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
